#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int dp[1<<10][1<<10];
string s1,s2;

//returns the length of answer for
//S1[1..i], and S2[1..j]
int rec(int i, int j){
	
	int &ret=dp[i][j];
	
	//dp[i][j] has been calculated already
	if(ret!=-1)return dp[i][j];
	
	//base case
	if(i<1 or j<1)return ret=i+j;
	
	//characters match
	if(s1[i-1]==s2[j-1])
		return ret=1+rec(i-1,j-1);
	
	else return ret=1+min(rec(i-1,j),rec(i,j-1));
}

int main() {
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	for(int p=1; p<=t; p++){
		
		//mark whole dp array uncalculated
		memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
		
		int n,m;
		cin >> n >> m >> s1 >> s2;
		
		cout << "Case " << p << ": " << rec(s1.length(),s2.length()) << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
